caption.title: Purification of LAH-PP7 fusion protein.
caption.p: (A) Coomassie-stained PAAG illustrating individual purification steps. Lane 1, summary expression; lane 2, supernatant; lane 3, urea extract loaded onto Superdex column; lane 4, peak protein fraction from Superdex column. (B) Size-exclusion chromatography profile and (C) Electron microscopy indicating aggregation of target protein.
Click here for additional data file.
